verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H5265"\w* \w forward|strong="H5265"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, over \w against|strong="H2583"\w* where \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* situate \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Balac \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sephor, \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhite,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* able \w to|strong="H3478"\w* sustain \w his|strong="H6440"\w* assault,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Madian: \w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* borders, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0413"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grass|strong="H3418"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w very|strong="H6258"\w* roots. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0776"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beer, \w a|strong="H7121"\w* soothsayer, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ammon, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H4994"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w*: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w means|strong="H5221"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Madian, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* price \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Balac:

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Tarry \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* whatsoever \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w while|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*:
\w What|strong="H4310"\w* mean \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee?

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Balac \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sephor \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*,

Saying: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H3318"\w* means \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*: \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath forbid \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* returning, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac: \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* noble \w than|strong="H7227"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w had|strong="H8269"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H5750"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H1121"\w*, \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith Balac \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sephor, Delay \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am ready \w to|strong="H0413"\w* honour thee, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* thou wilt: \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* Balac \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* alter \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w either|strong="H0518"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w less|strong="H6996"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w me|strong="H4994"\w* once \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w It|strong="H0518"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee, \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w command|strong="H1697"\w* thee.

\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* saddling \w his|strong="H6965"\w* ass \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Balaam, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* sat \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ass, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* ass \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w herself|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* went \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* mind \w to|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w her|strong="H7200"\w* again \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* \w narrow|strong="H4934"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w* between \w two|strong="H2088"\w* \w walls|strong="H1447"\w*, wherewith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w were|strong="H2088"\w* enclosed.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ass \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w thrust|strong="H5221"\w* herself close \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bruised \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rider. \w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* nevertheless \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* going \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* narrow \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* either \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w or|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* meet \w him|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ass \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* standing, she fell \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* feet \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rider: \w who|strong="H3068"\w* being \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* sides more vehemently \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ass, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* strikest thou \w me|strong="H5221"\w*, lo, \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* time?
